title: The best eco gifts for this season
description: With climate change increasingly becoming the biggest concern we have today, an eco-friendly gift that protects your devices -- as well as nature -- could be the best kind of gift for the season.

title: It's the end of programming as we know it -- again
description: As AI assumes more software development work, developers may eventually be working with training models more than they do with coding tools. And that's empowering.

title: 'Spin the wheel': Six top execs share the top career lessons they've learned
description: Senior professionals who've already reached the pinnacle offer best-practice advice to those who are still climbing the career ladder.

title: Apple's M2 MacBook Air: ZDNET Product of the Year
description: Apple's new flagship laptop has the super powers of higher-end machines. And, see our three honorable mentions for the best product of 2022.
